original_text: Also in Judah the hand of God was on the people to give them unity of mind to carry out what the king and his officials had ordered, following the word of the Lord.
korean_text: 하나님의 손이 또한 유다 사람들을 감동시키사 그들에게 왕과 방백들이 여호와의 말씀대로 전한 명령을 한 마음으로 준행하게 하셨더라

sentences.original_text: Also in Judah the hand of God was on the people
sentences.korean_translation: 또한 유다에서 하나님의 손이 백성들에게 임하였으니

sentences.original_text: to give them unity of mind
to carry out what the king and his officials had ordered
sentences.korean_translation: 왕과 그의 관리들이 명령한 것을 행하게 하려 함이라

sentences.original_text: following the word of the Lord
